data

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the library of songs retrieved from Reddit.
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier

    • Constructor Detail

      • Library

        public Library()

      • Library

        public Library(org.json.JSONArray posts)
        Builds a Library from a list of Reddit posts. If a SongException occurs, then the song is not added to the database.
        Parameters:
        posts - The JSON array containing the posts. Each post pertinent data are located in ["data"]

      • Library

        throws org.json.JSONException,

        Builds a Library from an external JSON file.

        Throws:

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
                           throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a JSON object containing all info. The object has one key 'list' that contains an array of JSON objects, each one representing a song.
        Returns:
        The library as a JSON object
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • like

        public void like(java.lang.String songId)
        Adds a songs the the liked songs
        Parameters:
        songId - The Reddit id corresponding to the song

      • append

        public void append(org.json.JSONArray posts)
        Appends posts to the already existing library. Only adds those that does not exists yet.
        Parameters:
        posts - An array of Reddit posts

      • save

        Saves the library to the default JSON file

      • getGenres

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGenres()
        Get the list of main genre in the library, and the number of occurrences.
        Returns:
        A map of the genres and their number of occurrences.
